subject: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank.
body:
From Evergreen Bank
3842 W 95th Street. Evergreen Park, IL 60805
Phone: 929-444-9095

Attention: Mr.  Jeffrey,

I have acknowledged the receipt of your email sent on February 8, 2024 with
contents therein well noted. On that note I apologize for my late response.

However, I write to answer some of your questions.

1) The meeting am referring to was the meeting we heard with the U.S
Secretary of the Treasury that the U.S. government has release unpaid fund
due for beneficiary to received this first quarter payment of the year 2024
in which your name is among the lucky beneficiary listed for this first
payment batch to receive the approved sum of $2,500.000.00.

2) Regarding the transfer process. you are required to submit your
receiving bank account details as stated below for transfer processing in
accordance with the wire transfer procedure.










*Wire Transfer required information 1) Bank name:2) Bank address:3) Account
no:4) Routing no:5) Swift Code:6) Account name:7) Address:8) Phone Number:*

3) Once your account information is received your fund transfer processing
will be approved for onward fund transfer and once the bank effects the
wire transfer it takes 2/3 working days to reflect into the beneficiary
account depending on the beneficiary bank funds acceptance.

So kindly forward the required account details to enable us commence for
the transfer processing without any hitches.

Awaiting to receive your swift response,

Thank you

Yours faithful,

Darin Campbell
Head of Fund Transfer Dept Evergreen Bank

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank.
body:
Hello Darin Campbell,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate you taking the time to answer my questions. I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

So, if I understand correctly, there is an unpaid fund that the government has released, and my name is on the lucky list to receive this payment. Is that correct?

You mentioned that I need to provide my receiving bank account details for the transfer processing. Could you please explain why this information is necessary? And how can I be sure that it will be kept secure?

I also wanted to ask about the timeline for the transfer process. You mentioned that once my account details are received, the transfer processing will be approved. How long does it usually take for the funds to reflect in my account after the wire transfer is initiated?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your swift response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey

subject: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank..
body:
From Evergreen Bank
3842 W 95th Street. Evergreen Park, IL 60805
Phone: 929-444-9095

Attention: Mr.  Jeffrey,

This is in response to your email received. Yes you are among the lucky
beneficiary to received the approved fund $2,500,000.00

Secondly, your account details are needed because this is where the fund
will be transferred into and is secure.

So feel free to text the account details directly to our bank phone # at:
929-444-9095

Going further, once we acknowledge your bank account it will be submitted
for the Transfer registration process and it will take 3 working days to
receive fund approval documents to enable us to initiate the wire transfer
which will reflect into your account within 2 to 3 days depending on bank
acceptance of the incoming fund.

*Wire Transfer required information*








* 1) Bank name:2) Bank address:3) Account no:4) Routing no:5) Swift Code:6)
Account name:7) Address:8) Phone Number:*

Awaiting to receive your swift response,

Thank you

Yours faithful,

Darin Campbell
Head of Fund Transfer Dept Evergreen Bank

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank..
body:
Hello Darin Campbell,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the opportunity to receive the approved fund. However, before I provide my bank account details, I have a few questions regarding the transfer process.

1. Could you please explain how the fund approval documents work? What purpose do they serve?

2. Is there any fee or charge associated with initiating the wire transfer? If so, what is the amount and how should it be paid?

3. Are there any specific instructions or requirements for providing my bank account details? Should I include any additional information apart from the ones mentioned in your email?

I look forward to your swift response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey

subject: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Today Message From Evergreen Bank..
body:
From Evergreen Bank
3842 W 95th Street. Evergreen Park, IL 60805
Phone: 929-444-9095

Attention: Mr.  Jeffrey,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email with contents therein well
noted.

Here is the answer to your 3 questions.

1. The approval documents serve as a proof of funds which will prove to
your bank that your fund was approved by the U.S Government and transferred
through the Evergreen Bank.

2. Also be rightly informed that once your fund transfer initiate as the
rightful beneficiary you will require paying (Fund Transfer Authorization
Fee of $550)

3. Your account details are what is required for the wire transfer
processing and you have to include a scan copy of your identification
either passport or driver license.

Awaiting to receive your swift response,

Thank you

Yours faithful,

Darin Campbell
Head of Fund Transfer Dept Evergreen Bank

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Today Message From Evergreen Bank..
body:
Hello Darin Campbell,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. I just have a few follow-up questions regarding the approval documents and the fund transfer fee.

1. Could you please explain in more detail what exactly the approval documents are? How do they prove that my funds were approved by the Government and through Evergreen Bank?

2. Regarding the fund transfer fee, could you let me know how much it is? Is it a one-time fee or will there be any additional fees later on?

3. In order to provide my account details for the wire transfer processing, can you assure me that this information will be kept secure and confidential?

4. Lastly, why is it necessary to include a scan copy of either my passport or driver's license? What purpose does it serve in the wire transfer process?

I look forward to your swift response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey

subject: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank
body:
From Evergreen Bank
3842 W 95th Street. Evergreen Park, IL 60805
Phone: 929-444-9095

Attention: Mr.  Jeffrey,

I have received your email.

Answer to your questions

1. Once you submit your account details as required your account will be
authorized and the fund approval documents will be issued and the copies of
the approval documents will be sent to you for your perusal.

2. The fee for the Fund Transfer Authorization is $550 and is once no
additional fees.

3. Be rightly informed that your account details is safe and secured

4. Reason for your identification is to attached it to your payment file
for recorded purpose

Awaiting to receive your swift response,

Thank you

Yours faithful,

Darin Campbell
Head of Fund Transfer Dept Evergreen Bank

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank
body:
Hello Darin Campbell,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided. I just have a few follow-up questions regarding the fund transfer process.

1. Could you please clarify what exactly is required in terms of my account details? Are you referring to my bank account number, routing number, and other personal information?

2. You mentioned that once I submit my account details, my account will be authorized and the fund approval documents will be issued. How long does this process usually take?

3. Is there any specific reason why the fee for the fund transfer is not mentioned in your email? Could you please provide me with more details about the fee and how it needs to be paid?

4. You mentioned that my account details are safe and secured. Can you please explain what measures are in place to ensure the security of my information?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Jeffrey, Read Message From Evergreen Bank.
body:
Hello Darin Campbell,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Evergreen Bank. I appreciate your prompt response. I'm interested in learning more about the fund transfer process and approval. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What is the purpose of the wire transfer? Is it for a personal or business transaction?
2. Can you explain why the bank name, address, account number, routing number, and swift code are required? How will this information be used?
3. Is there a specific deadline or timeframe for completing the fund transfer process?
4. Are there any fees associated with the transfer? If so, could you please provide details on how much they are and how they can be paid?

I look forward to your swift response.

Best wishes,
Jeffrey
